mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_board_recommendation (bno, uno, rec) VALUES (#{bno}, #{uno}, #{rec})
mapper.select: SELECT rec, COUNT(bno) AS cnt, uno FROM t_board_recommendation WHERE bno = #{bno} GROUP BY rec ORDER BY rec DESC

SELECT A.bno, A.bcd, A.btitle, A.brdt , COUNT(B.uno) AS rec FROM t_board A INNER JOIN t_board_recommendation AS B ON A.bno = B.bno WHERE A.bdel = 0 AND A.bcd = #{bcd} AND DATE(A.brdt) = CURDATE() GROUP BY A.bno ORDER BY rec DESC LIMIT 20

SELECT A.bno, A.bcd, A.btitle, A.brdt , COUNT(B.uno) AS rec FROM t_board A INNER JOIN t_board_recommendation AS B ON A.bno = B.bno WHERE A.bdel = 0 AND A.bcd = #{bcd} AND DATE(A.brdt) between (CURDATE()-7) and CURDATE() GROUP BY A.bno ORDER BY rec DESC LIMIT 20
